mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORDER(porder_code, manager, porder_date, create_ip, create_id, account_no) VALUES (#{pOrderCode}, #{manager}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createIp}, #{createId}, #{accountNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE PORDER SET PORDER_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, MANAGER = #{pOrderModifyDto.manager}, MODIFY_IP = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyIp}, MODIFY_ID = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyId}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{pOrderModifyDto.accountNo} WHERE PORDER_CODE = #{pOrderCode}
UPDATE PORDER SET MODIFY_IP = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyIp}, MODIFY_ID = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyId}, STATE = 'CMP' WHERE PORDER_CODE = #{pOrderCode}
UPDATE PORDER SET MODIFY_IP = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyIp}, MODIFY_ID = #{pOrderModifyDto.modifyId}, STATE = 'ING' WHERE PORDER_CODE = #{pOrderCode}
mapper.select: SELECT porder_code, porder_date, create_date, create_ip, create_id, modify_date, modify_ip, modify_id, state, account_no FROM PORDER WHERE PORDER_CODE = #{pOrderCode}
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM PORDER WHERE PORDER_CODE = #{pOrderCode} ) THEN true ELSE false END

SELECT PORDER_CODE, PORDER_DATE, MANAGER, ACCOUNT_NO, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_IP, CREATE_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_ID FROM PORDER
(STATE = 'WAIT' OR STATE = 'ING')
AND PORDER_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pOrderCode}), '%')
AND MANAGER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{manager}), '%')
AND ACCOUNT_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{accountNo}), '%')
AND PORDER_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND PORDER_DATE <= #{endDate}
